M

Main - Class in <Unnamed>
The main class, initializes the Application and sets it to visible
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
 
MainMenuView - Class in view
The view the player sees when they are at the main menu There are four buttons 1) A button to take them to a PastLevelsView 2) A button to take them to an AchievementsView 3) A button toshow the credits
MainMenuView(Application) - Constructor for class view.MainMenuView
Construct a new MainMenuView in the given Application frame
MakeClearMoveController - Class in controller
This is the controller bound to the board during a clear move.
MakeClearMoveController(Level, LevelView) - Constructor for class controller.MakeClearMoveController
Make a new MakeClearMoveController
MakeSwapMoveController - Class in controller
this is the controller bound to the board whenever the user wants to make a swap move Every time they click on a NumberTilePanel, it tries to add it to the move After two valid tiles, the move should be valid, and the two will swap positions
MakeSwapMoveController(Level, LevelView) - Constructor for class controller.MakeSwapMoveController
Construct a new MakeSwapMoveController for the given level, and its associated levelView
MakeUserMoveController - Class in controller
User moves are the default type.
MakeUserMoveController(Level, LevelView) - Constructor for class controller.MakeUserMoveController
Constructs a new MakeUserMoveController for the given Level and its associated LevelView
mark() - Method in class model.AbstractTileContainer
sets marked to true
marked() - Method in class model.AbstractTileContainer
A tile being marked means it counts towards the completion goal on elimination levels
marked() - Method in class model.BucketTileContainer
Since bucket tiles cannot be used in usermoves, they cannot be marked Since bucket tiles should not appear in elimination levels, there is no harm in always returning false
model - package model
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.AchievementPanelController
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.ExitLightningLevelController
Cancel the Timer for the level and return to main menu
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.ExitSplashScreen
Switch the View on the Application to a new MainMenuView
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.InitiateClearMoveController
Set the active controller on the board to a MakeClearMoveController if the User has a clearmove to use
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.InitiateSwapMoveController
Set the active controller on the board to a MakeSwapMoveController do this only if the User has a SwapMove to use
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.MakeClearMoveController
Try to add the tilePanel under the mouse to a new clearMove.
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.MakeSwapMoveController
If the JPanel under the mouse is a TilePanel, add it to the SwapMove If the SwapMove is valid (after two tiles), run the move After every move, we check if the level is complete
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.PastLevelViewController
change the Application view to a PastLevelPanel where the user can see all levels
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.PlayPastLevelController
Start the Level bound to this button.
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.QuitController
Quit the game
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.RearrangeBoardController
Rearrange the board, sixes do not change position
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.ResetAchievementsController
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.ResetProgressController
Reset all level progress and high scores Lock all but the first level Unbind controllers from the PastLevelButtons Cannot be undone
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.RestartLevelController
Restart the Level and refresh the GUI
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.ReturnToMenuController
Return to the main menu by changing the Application panel to a new MainMenuView
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.ShowCreditController
Show the Credit screen (the splash panel)
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.MakeUserMoveController
As the mouse is dragged, any tiles it drags over will be added to the move if they are adjacent to any existing tiles, or they are the first tile Note: We do not stop adding tiles after the sum reaches six, so invalid moves are entirely possible, and subtract moves from the user
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.AchievementPanelController
 
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.AchievementPanelController
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.AchievementPanelController
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.MakeUserMoveController
Initiate a new UserMove, and try to add the current tile
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.AchievementPanelController
 
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.MakeUserMoveController
Check to see if the userMove we have created is valid, if so, run it After every move, check to see if the level is complete
